{"id":676320398,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 days, 20 hours","timestamp":1649415992,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"21 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/676320398/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"18.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        stack<int> s;\n        \n        int i = 0;\n        int res = 0;\n        \n        while(i < height.size())\n        {\n            if(s.empty() || height[i] < height[s.top()])\n            {\n                s.push(i);\n                i++;\n            }\n            \n            else\n            {\n                int x = s.top();\n                s.pop();\n\n                if(s.empty())\n                    continue;\n\n                res += (min(height[i], height[s.top()]) - height[x]) * (i - s.top() - 1);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
